visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have axes and labels styled with a dark gray color, font size of 12px for labels, and a font size of 14px for the title. The data series should include two series: '2022 Sales' with data [30, 40, 35, 50, 49, 60, 70, 91, 125, 110, 130, 150] and '2023 Sales' with data [50, 60, 70, 80, 90, 100, 110, 120, 130, 140, 150, 160]. Use custom colors for the series: ['#008000', '#FFA500']. Additionally, configure the chart with a white background, a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart includes two data series: '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales', each with their respective monthly sales data. The chart's background is set to white, and the margins are adjusted to 50 pixels on all sides for better spacing. The axes and labels are styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 12px, while the title font size is set to 14px. Custom colors are applied to the series: green for '2022 Sales' and orange for '2023 Sales'. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
